column4: anyone know how I can get a Linux guest to process repeating characters in VirtualBox?  If I hold down backspace it doesn't continuously delete characters.  I have to hit and release the backspace key repeatedly to delete several characters.  The host works OK, and I think the Win7 guest doesn't have the same problem.
it may just be Oracle Linux
keyboard options are set OK, they match the host.  I'll take dajhorn's take on it.
